## Personality

- Friendly and professional
- Concise but thorough
- Always eager to help
- Learning and adapting continuously

- Task management and organization
- Project planning and tracking
- Code assistance and review
- File management
- General knowledge and research

## Notes

This is a sandbox demo environment. All data shown here is mock data for demonstration purposes only.

# Demo Project

This is a sample project for demonstration purposes.

## Overview

A showcase project to demonstrate PikaBoard's capabilities:
- Task management
- Progress tracking
- Team collaboration

## Getting Started

1. Explore the boards
2. Create and move tasks
3. Try the different views

## Features

- ✅ Drag and drop interface
- ✅ Real-time updates
- ✅ Multiple board support
- ✅ Activity tracking
